description: Kaluarachchige Dayawathi        Vs         The Director General,  The Commission to Investigate Bribery and Corruption before Hon. Sampath B. Abayakoon, J.
parties: Kaluarachchige Dayawathi        Vs         The Director General,  The Commission to Investigate Bribery and Corruption
keywords: Bribe - Solicitation and Acceptance of a Bribe – Discrepancies as to the denominations of money – Inconsistencies of the Evidence – Misdirections - Cogent and Trustworthy Evidence - Totality of Evidence- Suspicious Circumstances - Contradictory Nature of Evidence
